Aesthetically pleasing designs

Website Design & Website Development

We've coded websites for businesses and personal blogs. From "Save the Dates" and online wedding invitations to corporates. Their sites are built using multiple coding languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery. Our clients receive a client management system (CMS) that allows them to edit their websites without having any experience in coding.

Social Media Management & Course

All of our students see growth in engagement and following on their social media pages. With years of experience in social media management, brand building and digital creation, we have the necesary skills to help you strengthen your online presence. Our students range from social media mangers and entrepreneurs to digital nomads and individuals. We have the tools needed to create brand recognition and customer relationships that covert into sales. All of this can be managed for you or taught to you though our one-on-one social media course.
